game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land of Eridoria is plagued by a terrible curse that causes all living things to slowly wither away. The people of Eridoria have lost hope.
ending: With the curse lifted and the world saved, the protagonist becomes known as a hero, restoring balance and prosperity to the land.
A new era of peace and cooperation dawns on Eridoria.
synopsis: In "Echoes of Eternity," players take on the role of a young adept who discovers they have the ability to wield magic, a long-lost art thought to be extinct.
Guided by a wise old sage, they embark on a perilous journey across treacherous landscapes and ancient ruins.

synopsis.The objective is to uncover the source o: a powerful artifact created by an ancient civilization.

game.title: Echoes of Eternity
